metadata.subject: Moreton-Chabrillan, Jacques Henri Sébastien César, comte de, 1752-1793
France. Armée
metadata.title: Lettre de J.H. Moreton-Chabrillan, l'un de plus anciens colonels en activité de l'armée, a M. Du Portail, ministre de la guerre : Paris, le 2 juillet, 1791.
metadata.creator: Moreton-Chabrillan, Jacques Henri Sébastien César, comte de, 1752-1793.

metadata.publisher: [Paris] : De l'imprimerie de Calixte Volland, rue des Noyers, no. 38,
metadata.description: Place and suggested date of publication based on another edition, published by Volland in 1791. Cf. Martin & Walter
Variant of Martin & Walter. Révolution française, III, 25261
metadata.notes: No copyright page found. No table-of-contents pages found. Title page is on the cover. Damaged, stained, and/or loose pages. Uneven binding. Skewed text.
